interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
The Amazon Rainforest in Brazil is the largest rainforest in the world.
Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest coral reef system.
Germany is known for its precision engineering and is the birthplace of the automobile.
India is the world's largest democracy by population.
South Africa is known for its diverse culture and is home to the famous Kruger National Park.
France is known for its iconic Eiffel Tower and delicious wines.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
The UK is home to the oldest operating parliament in the world.
